mapper.select: SELECT *,(g.price+o.price_updown) AS final_price FROM tb_cart c INNER JOIN tb_goods g ON c.goods_no=g.goods_no INNER JOIN tb_goods_option o ON c.option_no=o.option_no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_cart (goods_count, cart_add_date, goods_no, member_no, option_no) VALUES (#{goods_count}, #{cart_add_date}, #{goods_no}, #{member_no}, #{option_no})
